name: Larry Smith
description: OK, here I go again, single parent of a 7 y/o girl, work for the army/national guard, i like sports being the rangers, mexico national team, green bay,mavs, lakers, dallas stars and black hawks my fav teams. I enjoy going to the rangers games. I’m not into the club scene anymore, I prefer a sports bar for a couple of drinks while watching a game. I love adventures, I can be lazy and within a minute I’m like “Let’s do this ****!” lol…..Interests well, photography and video editing, carpentry, dancing (is a must) music (dj, I have a sound system, is not too big but it’s loud) what else, oh yeah, roller coasters !! hell yeah!!! Ok what else, I’m certified as an EMT, worked in the ER department for a while and private EMS, now like I said I’ll be somewhere in kuwait till 2 next year,right now I’m stationed in FT Hood for more training before heading to talibanland, so if you are interested in a pen pal a friend or meet well I’m up for it so anyway, want to know more about me myself and I just send me a message, I dont bite..lol.
